MARVEL COMICS

  • {{ comic.title }}

    {{comic.description}}

    {{comic.description}}

import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { ApiMarvelService } from 'src/app/service/api-marvel.service'; import { Observable } from 'rxjs'; @Component({ selector: 'app-personal-side', templateUrl: './personal-side.component.html', styleUrls: ['./personal-side.component.css'] }) export class PersonalSideComponent { title = 'marvelApp'; loader = true; public comics: Array = []; constructor(private ApiMarvelSvc: ApiMarvelService){ } allComics?: Observable; ngOnInit(): void { this.ApiMarvelSvc.getComics().subscribe((res) => { console.log('Respuesta', res); this.comics = res.data.results; this.loader = false; }); } }
